channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2025010345
item.description:
Report X-2025010345

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-12T03:40:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-02
  • City: NEWPORT NEWS
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT NEEDED TO BE REWRAPPED. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (30) 14.5 OUNCE CARBON DIOXIDE SODASTREAM CYLINDERS. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2025010285
item.description:
Report X-2025010285

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-12T03:40:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-10
  • City: WEST POINT
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: Norfolk Southern
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Tank car TCIX210101 was found leaking from the Bottom Outlet Valve (BOV). The BOV handle was not fully closed due to the securement pin not being installed. Approximately 1 gallon of product leaked out through weeping around secondary closure plug due to the cap not being properly secured.
